result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donvonta R Pearson

records.addlTxt: Motion To Withdraw, Received and Filed
Felony Pretrial Scheduling Order, Signed and Filed

Defendant Donvonta R Pearson appeared by video, in custody in WSPF.  Attorney Russell J. A. Jones in court for Donvonta R Pearson.  Attorney Chad Wozniak in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Defense Counsel has been officially appointed. Court acknowledges appointment on the record. Matter is adjourned for Scheduling Dates.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 24, 2023 at 10:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for March 6, 2023 at 08:30 am.
received and filed.
received and filed.

Defendant Donvonta R Pearson not in court, in custody.  Attorney Chad Wozniak in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant is currently at WSPF and not produced.  New counsel is needing to be appointed by the PD's office.

Court ordered case adjourned for Status of Counsel and for the defendant to appear by zoom.  Clerk to notify the facility
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
STATE'S RESPONSE TO DEFENDANT'S MOTION TO SUPPRESS STATEMENT, received and filed.

Defendant Donvonta R Pearson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Defendant Donvonta R Pearson in custody.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defense counsel's motion to withdraw by the court.  Due to a breakdown in communication with client, defense request to withdraw.    Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.   Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 6.  Status conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Defense counsel contacts the court requesting a motion to withdraw date.  The parties agreed via email to the new date and time.  Next court date 8/3/2022 at 1:30pm in person.
Defense request to withdraw received and filed
Affidavit Received and Filed.
Motion to Withdraw as Counsel received and filed
DEFENDANT'S MOTION TO SUPPRESS STATEMENTS; filed.

Attorney James Edgar Toran in court, defendant Donvonta R Pearson not in court, in custody.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Court waives defendant's appearance for today's court date.  Defense counsel requests Miranda Goodchild motion.  Court orders any state response/reply due to the court no later than 7/29/2022.  Defendant to be produced in person.  Case adjourned, Br. 15.  Motion hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney James Edgar Toran in court, defendant Donvonta R Pearson not in court, in custody.
Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for scheduling conference. Discussions placed on the record. Defense requests adjournment. Defendant to appear via Zoom. Case remains calendared before Branch 15.
Motion of Attorney Vincent Guimont to withdraw granted by the Court.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Defendant Donvonta R Pearson in court with attorneys James Toran and Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Donvonta R Pearson in custody.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donvonta R Pearson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Detective Jose Flores - MPD.   State rests. Court took judicial notice of defendant's prior conviction regarding case 18CF1252. Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 15.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.
by Attorney Toran, filed.

Adjustment Number: 22A 036941,
Payable Number: 1000300,

Amount: $20.00
received and filed.

Defendant Donvonta R Pearson not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Donvonta R Pearson in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Donvonta R Pearson in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donvonta R Pearson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Watts, Branch 15.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
